alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Alachua and northwestern Marion Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Williston, moving northeast at 25 mph. Other storms were just west of Gainesville moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, University Of Florida, Gainesville Airport, Newnans Lake, Rochelle, Micanopy, Flemington and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion
